title: Junjou Booklets
sinopse:
Booklets were released with the Drama CDs and volume 3 limited edition for Junjou, continuing the story where it left off in volume 3.

1. Aquarium Date
2. First Night And...
3. Go to a Hot Spring
4. Holiday Planning
5. The Dolphin and the Bear
6. Being Together is Becoming Routine...
7. With Him
8. Your Obsession

(Source: Ose_93)
